name: Alien Abduction (ITA_SRL, erlingdammandersen)
description:
You play as an Alien who has just arrived on Earth. You fly around in your mini saucer and take samples from this strange world. You have to shoot the objects you want to collect to send them up to your spaceship that's orbiting the Earth.

Controls:

Move - WASD / Left Joystick

Shoot - Left Mouse Button / Face Button Bottom

Pause - Esc / Right Special
